snippet: After the Brazilian Blowout was found to have significant amounts of formaldehyde, a known carcinogen, hair-care companies have stepped in to market their own at-home straightening products.
abstract: Many hair-care companies are marketing at-home straightening products to replace the Brazilian Blowout, hair-straightening treatment found to have significant amounts of formaldehyde, a known carcinogen.
lead_paragraph: After the Brazilian Blowout was found to have significant amounts of formaldehyde, a known carcinogen, hair-care companies have stepped in to market their own at-home straightening products.

headline.seo: Hair-Straightening Treatments to Use at Home
